titleStmt.title: The shepheard, or A sermon, preached at a synode in Durisme Minster, vpon Tuesday, being the fifth of April. 1608. By Thomas Oxley, Master of Artes, and preacher of Gods word
titleStmt.author: Oxley, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Jaggard] for Eleazer Edgar, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls church-yard, at the signe of the VVind-mill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls church-yard, at the signe of the VVind-mill
